item.title: How to Learn Math (especially on your own)
How to read a math book
item.description: There are many ways to read math, Here is my strategy, it works for me, others do this differently with great success. I can’t tell you how to live your life but my suggestion is to try it this way and adapt it to your style. I read with the book, a pen, and a legal pad (or a white board/chalk board, or if you’re so inclined a TeX editor). You want to make it cheap to write stuff down because you’ll be writing a lot more than you’re reading so do whatever you need to achieve that.
